title: Back to the Futura. The Devil Wears Kada. Etc.
content:
[Design Observer](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170346/http:/www.designobserver.com/) has a link to this funny post about mixing typeface names and movie titles:

[http://www.septemberindustry.co.uk/blog/?p=266](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170346/http:/www.septemberindustry.co.uk/blog/?p=266 "http://www.septemberindustry.co.uk/blog/?p=266")

author: Ricardo Cordoba
